title: GM Plans to Seek Banking Charter to Grow Auto-Lending Business
sub_head: Auto maker could file paperwork with federal and state regulators as soon as next month
body:
General Motors Co. is looking to get back in the banking business.
The auto makerâ€™s lending arm is drawing up plans to apply for a banking charter, a move that would allow it to accept deposits and expand its auto-finance business, according to people familiar with the matter.
General Motors Financial Company Inc. has been talking to federal...
